name: PrepWellAcademy
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
PrepWell Academy is an online mentoring program that helps your child (and you) navigate the college admissions process - with particular focus on early preparation.

We specialize in four niches. Students aspiring to: (1) Top 200 colleges, (2) Top 50 colleges, (3) service academies (e.g. Naval Academy, West Point, etc.) or ROTC scholarships, and (4) play sports in college (e.g. scholarship opportunities).

We believe students who engage early in the process (freshman and sophomore year) have a disproportionate advantage over those who engage later.

This briefing will provide daily guidance to the students to stay ahead of the curve and prepare well .
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
